subject: Same ol' same ol'
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
This is noisy, I try not to filter, so it might be hard to hear. Even if
some can hear it, I doubt anyone will actually listen as most "know
better".  I wouldn't even bother posting, except it seems to be addressed to
the planet.
